title: The Mysterious Disappearance of Jamal Khashoggi
description:
It has been one week since Saudi journalist and Washington Post contributing columnist Jamal Khashoggi was last seen alive. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg's Marc Champion on who might be involved in his disappearance and why. 
FOLLOW UP
 Marc's latest report: Turkey’s Bizarre Conspiracy Case Against an American Pastor 
You can follow Marc at: @MarcChampion1
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
